name: Dreaming Diorama
description:
A casual cozy puzzle game where you create various dioramas.
Explore and assemble dioramas in a 3D environment.
Each diorama is made up of pieces and assembling them is one big puzzle.
Use the freedom to build from any location to create your own unique strategies.
Enjoy relaxing gameplay that allows you to create dioramas at your own pace with no time restraints.

Note From the Developer

Each Diorama is built around different themes.
And like a rollercoaster ride some are calm while others are lively.
Each diorama is made up of pieces, and each diorama is a piece of a larger picture,
a wholesome experience which will hopefully leave you with a good feeling when completing the game.
I hope that anyone who enjoys puzzles and creating things will enjoy this game.
